errors.condition: This can occur when not enough search parameters are set.
errors.rationale: If the search is too broad then this can cause the majority or all of the information in the data store to be processed.  This can take a long time to respond and will impact other users of the system
errors.errorMessage: This operation requires a minimum of either the booking reference, telephone number, email address or the surname and postcode
errors.actionNeeded: Please populate either the booking reference, telephone number, email address or the surname and postcode
